TopicTitle: Attaching eight "Clydesdales" to one "Cockatoo" is... interesting

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.2 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 22H2 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X 6-Core Processor 3.70 GHz | GPU: 3070 TI | RAM: 32,0 GB 3600 mhz (operating at 3200 mhz) cl17

 

Doing so in 8x symmetry makes the entire thing violently shake itself apart at launch. 

Not sure if this is useful, but it might be interesting to look at regarding the "noodly rockets". 

Steps to replicate: 

  1. Grab "Cockatoo" command pod. 
  2. Grab eight "Clydesdale" SRBs and attach them in 8x symmetry to said "Cockatoo". 
  3. Launch.
  4. Watch.

I have reliably replicated it myself. Actually launching it is a sight to behold.

It happened 4 out of 5 times with me. Bill may have some traumas from this, but oh well. Val will handle it. 

Turning SAS off or on makes no difference.
